English: I enjoy playing soccer in my free time.
French: J'aime jouer au football dans mon temps libre.

English: I like to read books before going to bed.
French: J'aime lire des livres avant de me coucher.

English: Every morning, I drink a cup of coffee.
French: Chaque matin, je bois une tasse de café.

English: I usually watch TV shows on weekends.
French: Je regarde généralement des séries TV les week-ends.
